name.en: A Study of Hakka Phonology and Corpus Analysis

department.ch: 客家語文暨社會科學學系客家研究碩士在職專班
department.en: The Executive Master Program of Hakka Studies,Department of Hakka Language and Social Sciences

goal.ch:
"1.學會田野調查的方法以及語料的整理分析
2.熟悉客家話與中古音的演變關係
3.了解客家話的音韻特色
4.熟悉語言研究的相關理論
5.了解客家語文研究的範疇"
goal.en:
"1. Understand the field investigation method and corpus analysis
2. Be familiar with the evolution relationship between Hakka and ancient Chinese phonology
3. Understand the phonological features of Hakka 
4. Be familiar with the relevant theories of language research
5. Understand the categories of language studies in Hakka"

outline.ch:
"授課內容:
1.田野調查的方法與步驟
(1)調查字表的編排與運用
(2)民間文學、詞彙、語法的調查
(3)語料分析
2.客家話的音韻研究
(1)漢語音韻學的基礎概念
(2)客家話與中古音的關係
(3)客家話的語音演變
(4)客家話的音韻特色
3.田野調查的語料分析
(1)田調語料的整理
(2)音韻特色的描寫
(3)語音演變的規律
4.客家詞彙與文化的研究
（1）客家詞彙與文化的相關研究
（2）客家話的詞類
（3）客家話的語法
（4）文化語言學的範疇
5.客家文學與民間文學的研究
(1)客家文學與民間文學的相關研究
(2)文學理論概述
6.客語教材與教學的研究
(1)客語教材與教學的研究範疇"
outline.en:
"1. Methods and steps of field investigation
(1) Investigate the arrangement and application of character table
(2) Investigate the folk literature, vocabulary and grammar
(3) Corpus analysis
2. Research of phonology of Hakka
(1) The basic concept of Chinese phonology
(2) The relationship between Hakka and ancient Chinese phonology
(3) The phonetic evolution of Hakka
(4) The phonological features of Hakka
3. Corpus analysis of field investigation
(1) The collation of field investigation corpus
(2) The description of phonological features
(3) The laws of phonetic evolution
4. Research of Hakka vocabulary and culture
(1) The related research of Hakka vocabulary and culture
(2) The Hakka’s part of speech
(3) The Hakka’s grammar
(4) The category of cultural linguistics
5. Research of Hakka literature and folk literature
(1) Research of Hakka literature and folk literature
(2) Introduction to the theory of literature
6. Research of Hakka’s teaching material and teaching
(1) Research category of Hakka’s teaching material and teaching"
